name: Dragonfire Glassworks
description: Dragonfire Glassworks, a fireproof stone structure, is a vibrant artisan workshop in the market square, known for its colorful stained glass panels and ornate ironwork designs. The interior, illuminated by the furnace’s cherry-red heat, houses a showroom of creations and an efficient workshop with various tools and raw materials for glassmaking. The owner, <u>Kras Emberglass</u>, is a seasoned glassblower known for his commitment to quality and his collection of colored beads, which customers can use to customize their orders. Apprentice <u>Rosemarie Starglow</u>, a promising young artisan, is known for her focus, dexterity, and her love for making glass flowers. She also handles stocking workbenches, basic shaping of items, and cleaning the shop.

quest.name: The Luminous Chalice
quest.description: While shopping, adventurers overhear a whispered conversation between Kras and Rosemarie about an ancient artifact known as the Luminous Chalice. The conversation sounds like they have discovered a clue to its location. According to local lore, the chalice was crafted centuries ago and holds a hidden map showing how to successfully traverse a deadly trap-filled dungeon killed with a king’s ransom of wealth that has killed many talented adventurers over the years.
